Data: A User Manual

University of Colorado Denver, Fall 2021

Schedule Assignments Policies

Markdown Practice

First create a new folder within your class folder data-a-user-manual called markdown-practice. Launch Jupyter Labs and create a new Jupyter Notebook in that folder with the filename: markdown-practice.ipynb.

  1. Use Markdown cells and headers to make an outline of your final project notebook following the different parts outlined on the assignment page.
  2. Insert a new markdown cell and figure out how to insert this photo.
  3. Figure out how to resize and center the photo (hint: use the Google!).

Cameron Blevins, University of Colorado Denver (Fall 2021)
Jekyll theme Forever Jekyll
